Name: The detective ChuLin
About the game: Game mode: the traditional RPG game mode collects clues by exploring the map and finds out the truth through clue reasoning. Synopsis; A spooky dinner, a thrilling journey of detectives, a careful search for clues, every reasoning can lead detectives astray. Be careful with each choice. Start your adventure.
